title: Tipsy Twin Cities
description: Tipsy Twin Cities: A full stack app using sequelize, Node.js, handlebars, and RESTful APIs. Find the best Happy Hour in Minneapolis!

title: Plant Tracker
description: Plant Tracker: A full-stack app using React.js, MySQL, and JavaScript to effectively track a user's indoor and outdoor plants.

title: News Time
description: News Time: Full stack app using JavaScript, MongoDB, Node.js. Scrape BBC News and catch up on the latest!

title: Burger Binge
description: Burger Binge: Full stack app using JavaScrit, MySql, Node.js, and Handlebars. Devour Burgers and see what happens!

title: BFF finder
description: Friend Finder: Full stack app using Javscript, Node.js, and express. Take the Survey to find your next BFF!

title: GIF of Thrones
description: GIF of Thrones: Front end app using JavaScrip with ajax and jQuery. Search and generate Game of Thrones themed gifs.

title: Trivia
description: Parks and Rec Trivia: Front end app using JavaScript with jQuery and bootstrap.  Test your knowledge of Leslie Knope and Pawnee!
